languages.text: {n}Ворон поворачивает голову, глядя на вас каждым глазом попеременно, а затем изгибает шею, словно кланяясь. Похоже, ворон наслушался самых лестных отзывов в ваш адрес и теперь пытается выразить подобострастие как может.{/n}

{n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ворон поворачивает голову, глядя на вас каждым глазом попеременно, а затем изгибает шею, словно кланяясь. Похоже, ворон наслушался самых лестных отзывов в ваш адрес и теперь пытается выразить подобострастие как может.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レイヴンは頭をかしげ、左右の目で交互にあなたを見つめ、それから首を伸ばしてお辞儀をするような仕草を見せた。どうやら、あなたに関する多くの称賛の言葉を聞き、自分なりに敬意を示そうとしているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンは頭をかしげ、左右の目で交互にあなたを見つめ、それから首を伸ばしてお辞儀をするような仕草を見せた。どうやら、あなたに関する多くの称賛の言葉を聞き、自分なりに敬意を示そうとしているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Rabe dreht den Kopf, sieht dich der Reihe nach mit jeweils einem Auge an und und reckt dann den Hals, als wolle er sich verbeugen. Anscheinend hat er jede Menge schmeichelhafter Worte über dich gehört und versucht nun nach Möglichkeit, Bewunderung darzustellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rabe dreht den Kopf, sieht dich der Reihe nach mit jeweils einem Auge an und und reckt dann den Hals, als wolle er sich verbeugen. Anscheinend hat er jede Menge schmeichelhafter Worte über dich gehört und versucht nun nach Möglichkeit, Bewunderung darzustellen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La corneille tourne la tête, vous observant d'un œil, puis de l'autre, avant de pencher sa tête en avant dans une tentative de révérence. Il semblerait que l'oiseau ait entendu de nombreuses louanges à votre égard et tente à présent de vous exprimer son respect en s'inclinant devant vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La corneille tourne la tête, vous observant d'un œil, puis de l'autre, avant de pencher sa tête en avant dans une tentative de révérence. Il semblerait que l'oiseau ait entendu de nombreuses louanges à votre égard et tente à présent de vous exprimer son respect en s'inclinant devant vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuervo gira la cabeza, mirándote primero con un ojo y luego con el otro, y después estira el cuello como si pretendiese hacer una reverencia. Parece que ha oído numerosos halagos hacia tu persona y ahora trata de expresar reverencia dentro de sus posibilidades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuervo gira la cabeza, mirándote primero con un ojo y luego con el otro, y después estira el cuello como si pretendiese hacer una reverencia. Parece que ha oído numerosos halagos hacia tu persona y ahora trata de expresar reverencia dentro de sus posibilidades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}渡鸦转过了头，目光凝视着你，之后伸长了脖子，仿佛要鞠躬一样。它似乎听到了许多关于你的溢美之词，此刻正在尽其所能，传达船员对你的敬意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}渡鸦转过了头，目光凝视着你，之后伸长了脖子，仿佛要鞠躬一样。它似乎听到了许多关于你的溢美之词，此刻正在尽其所能，传达船员对你的敬意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başını çeviren kuzgun, her iki gözüyle sana bakıyor ve ardından boynunu uzatıp âdeta eğilmek istercesine bir harekette bulunuyor. Anlaşılan hakkında pek çok övgü işitmiş ve şimdi gücü yettiğince hürmetini sunmaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven turns its head, looking at you with each eye in turn, then cranes its neck as if trying to bow. It seems it has heard an abundance of flattering words about you and is now attempting to express reverence to the best of its ability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgun başını çevirerek her iki gözüyle sana bakıyor, ardından boynunu uzatıp âdeta eğilmek istercesine bir hareket yapıyor. Anlaşılan hakkında pek çok övgü işitmiş ve şimdi gücü yettiğince hürmetini sunmaya çalışıyor.{/n}
